descriptions.text: +${value}% chance to generate an extra Residual Soul
+${value}% chance to generate an extra Necrotic Ectoplasm when performing a ritual
-${value}% chance to generate an extra Necrotic Ectoplasm when performing a ritual
+${value}% ${skillName} Mastery XP per maxed Star in Kezad constellation in Astrology

combatEffectTemplates.description: An effect that applies a total amount of damage, spread out over a number of 'procs' that occur at a fixed interval to a character while it is applied. Has a stacks parameter that is increased by the stacksToAdd parameter when the effect is re-applied. The effect is removed if the stacks parameter reaches 0, or combat ends.

items.name: Silver Amethyst Ring
items.customDescription: Provides +8 Necromancy Strength and +8 Necromancy Attack Bonus

items.name: Gold Amethyst Necklace
items.customDescription: Passive: +1% Damage Reduction when fighting Necromancy enemies with Necromancy

combatEffects.customDescription: +${chance}% chance to apply ${effectName} when hitting with a Necromancy attack
+${chance}% chance to apply ${effectName} when hitting with a Necromancy attack

items.name: Hand Wrap of the First Necromancer
Foot Wraps of the First Necromancer

combatEffects.customDescription: +${chance}% chance to apply ${effectName} when hitting with a necromancy attack

attacks.name: Necromancy
attacks.description: An attack that deals 100% damage.

attacks.name: Touch of Death
attacks.description: An attack that deals 100% damage and gain 4 stacks of Necrosis.

attacks.name: Soul Sap
attacks.description: An attack that deals 100% damage and gain 1 stacks of Residual Soul.

attacks.name: Finger of Death
attacks.description: An attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% damage, increased by 15% for each Necrosis Stack consumed. Consumes up to 6 Necrosis stacks.

attacks.name: Death Skulls
attacks.description: An attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% damage 5 times, each hit is increased by 30% by consuming one Necrosis stack.

attacks.name: Death Skulls
attacks.description: An attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% damage 5 times, each hit is increased by 75% by consuming one Necrosis stack.

attacks.name: Blood Siphon
attacks.description: An attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% damage 3 times over 3s, healing for 50% of damage done.

attacks.name: Bloat
attacks.description: An attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% damage, applying Bloat to the target. Bloat deals 50% of damage done every 1.8 seconds over 20s.

attacks.name: Soul Strike
attacks.description: An attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% damage and has a 10% chance to stun the target, increasing by 10% for each stack of Residual Soul.

attacks.name: Spectral Scythe (First Swing)
attacks.description: A three part attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% damage on the first swing and has a 25% chance to generate a Residual Soul.

attacks.name: Spectral Scythe (Second Swing)
attacks.description: The second swing deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% damage and has a 25% chance to generate a Residual Soul.

attacks.name: Spectral Scythe (Third Swing)
attacks.description: The third swing deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% damage, dealing 1% more damage for every 1% of Target's missing HP.

attacks.name: Volley of Souls
attacks.description: An attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% damage ${hitCount} times, adding extra attacks per stack of Residual Soul.

attacks.name: Skeletal Rage
attacks.description: Attacks twice dealing ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% damage with each strike, gaining a stack of Skeletal Rage.

attacks.name: Unleash Rage
attacks.description: A single attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% damage, increased by 10% for each stack of Skeletal Rage.

attacks.name: Whispers of Death
attacks.description: An attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% damage and drains 1 Sanity.

attacks.name: Creeping Death
attacks.description: An attack that hits 5 times dealing ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% damage on each hit and draining 1 Sanity.

attacks.name: Putrid Bolt
attacks.description: An attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% damage and applies Putrid Poison.

attacks.name: Putrid Spray
attacks.description: An attack that hits 3 times and deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% damage, applying Putrid Poison with each hit.

attacks.name: Putrid Explosion
attacks.description: An attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0} damage and applies Putrid Poison.

attacks.name: Daemonic Bite
attacks.description: An attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% damage.

attacks.name: Daemonic Swing
attacks.description: An attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}%.

attacks.name: Daemonic Smash
attacks.description: An attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% damage.

attacks.name: Daemonic Bolt
attacks.description: An attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% damage.

attacks.name: Whispers of Death
attacks.description: An attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% damage.

attacks.name: Execute
attacks.description: An attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% damage and an additional 1% for each 1% of target's missing hp.

attacks.name: Flames of the Defiler
attacks.description: An attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% damage 5 times.

attacks.name: Pulverize
attacks.description: An attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% damage.

attacks.name: Tri-Beam
attacks.description: An attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% damage.

attacks.name: Divine Edict
attacks.description: An attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% damage.

attacks.name: Prophecy Unleased
attacks.description: An attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% damage and deals an additional 1% damage for each 1% of the target's missing hp.

attacks.name: Crushing Blow
attacks.description: An attack that deals ${attackDamageMaxValue0}% damage.

combatPassives.name: Necromatic Presence
combatPassives.customDescription: Can only be damaged by Necromancy.

combatEffects.customDescription: You feel your sanity slipping away...

conjurations.customDescription: Hits for 50% of your damage every 2s. Applies Rage when hitting with an attack

conjurations.name: Putrid Zombie
conjurations.customDescription: Hits for 50% of your damage every 3s. Applies Putrid Poison when hitting with an attack.

conjurations.name: Vengeful Ghost
conjurations.customDescription: Hits for 25% of your damage every 1.5s. Heals you for 100% of damage done when hitting with an attack
